summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Pine Court from a fourth 145 feet north of Crescent Drive to Madrona Drive et al in the City of Seattle by construction sewers under Ordinance No. 16776, creating Local Improvement District No. 1556 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
